articles.title: OMAHA! Aggies secure super sweep of Louisville, punch ticket to CWS - TexAgs
articles.description: In a closely contested matchup on a 100-degree afternoon in College Station, #5 Texas A&M ultimately came up victorious against #12 Louisville, 4-3. Dylan Rock's seventh-inning sacrifice fly earned the Aggies their seventh trip to Omaha in program history.
